recipe_name: Stir-fried lamb with onion, cashews and redcurrants
author: Brian Turner
method: Heat the olive oil in a pan, add the sliced lamb and fry for 2-3 minutes, or until browned. Add the onion and red pepper and stir fry over a high heat for two minutes. Add the chilli flakes, soy sauce, a splash of boiling water, cashew nuts and pak choi and stir fry for 1-2 minutes. To serve, spoon into a bowl and garnish with redcurrants.
ingredients: dash olive oil,  100g/3½oz lamb chop, bone removed, sliced,  ½ onion, sliced,  1 small red pepper, sliced,  pinch chilli flakes,  2 tbsp soy sauce,  2 tbsp cashew nuts, toasted,  1 pak choi, halved,  2 tbsp redcurrants, stalks removed, to serve
